DOC.criteria: Patient stable chronic hemodialysis 3 month . PTH level 150 800 pg/ml . Ability give inform consent . Serum calcium level ( correct albumin level 4.0 g/dL ) less 10.5 mg/dL last three consecutive measurement . Serum Phosphorus level 2.5 7.0 mg/dL last three consecutive measurement . Ca x PProduct le 75 mg2/dL2 last three consecutive measurement . Known active malignancy . Liver disease define serum aspartate aminotransferase , alanine aminotransferase , gammaglutamyltransferase level 2 time upper limit normal . PTH level 150 pg/mL 800 pg/mL . Hypercalcemia hypercalcemic episode within last 4 week . Ca x PProduct 75 mg2/dL2 within last 4 week . Any clinical significant infection treat antibiotic within 6 week prior start study . Chronic viral infection ( HIV , Hepatitis B C ) . Currently immunosuppressive medication ( steroid , cyclosporine , etcâ€¦ ) . Hematocrit le 30 % . History blood disorder renal anemia .
